author: NO NAME
text:
Absolutely under no circumstances trust or buy from this company I’m warning anyone thinking about purchasing from Australia. They use UPS which are absolutely hopeless. I have a disability so when I know a package is coming I sit down stairs in the lounge which is next to the front door. 
7pm at night I finally have in and assumed it wasn’t being delivered that day refreshes the delivery website and it said delivered. I went outside and looked everywhere and nothing. No one had knocked and I hadn’t signed for anything. I rang UPS (don’t use them terrible customer service) they couldn’t have cared less they said it was showing as delivered and I asked how it has to be signed for they said the driver signs now because of covid. So the package has either been delivered to the wrong address or the drivers can see where these packages are coming from sign for them and keep them. 
So o contacted the real real they weren’t Interested and kept sending me emails saying it says delivered and signed for I said I hadn’t signed for anything and they didn’t care in the slightest. So my money for the handbag I purchased is just gone.  
BE WARNED DO NOT BUY FROM THEM IF SOMETHING GOES WRONG THEY ABSOLUTELY DO NOT CARE.
title: BE WARNED DO NOT BUY FROM THEM.

author: A.L.
text:
HORRENDOUS SELLING EXPERIENCE - They lie and bait and switch you on commission payments. DO NOT SELL THROUGH THEM.

They promised me 70% commissions, confirmed in writing. My items started selling (without my approval, mind you) and then they refused to respond to me over email, call, or text. Good luck getting a hold of anyone.

They also are holding over $5,000 of items hostage - it has been over a month and they haven't sent these items back, replied about them, or provided any update or expected timeline.
title: HORRENDOUS SELLING EXPERIENCE

author: Allison
text: The shoe sizes were completely off. The blue heels were closer to a size 7. The dress size was very much a small. And the return policy is AWFUL. We pay $12 to have them shipped and to return items, also $12. And you guys can't even include a shipping label, the customer has to print it which I'm sure most people don't own a printer and on top of that it must go through UPS. So trying out this company has cost me $25 and about an hour of my time to head to UPS to ship back products which were completey mis marketed.
title: Mismarketed and Costly Shipping Policy

author: Stacy
text: The handbag I purchased said ‘extremely good’ condition. When I received it, there were small holes in the leather and something brown and sticky spilled on the inside and all over the zipper tracks. I’d be embarrassed to carry this bag in public.  Be very careful of the quality they claim. I can’t imagine what ‘good’ or ‘fair’ condition would entail.
title: Visibly second hand quality

author: customer
text: With no way to try on clothes, you are forced to blindly purchase clothes. I was okay with this since there is a refund policy, however upon trying to make a return, I found that I would only be receiving about 70% back. I bought a suit for ~$74 and with taxes and shipping came out to $110. When I tried to make a return I only receive $65. They made $45 off of me and get to keep the product. I will never be purchasing from the RealReal ever again
